name: ADVentura - La Llorona - Robusto
additionalNotes: La Llorona is an ADVentura exclusive line created for Elite Accounts in the US; a program created by ADVentura to show gratitude with exclusivity for those that support them most. La Llorona is a tale from Latin folklore. She is a vengeful ghost that roams the seas mourning her dead loved ones, which she herself killed. She appears when least expected and shows mercy to no one. The first third begins with chocolate chip cookie, smokey bacon, and hints of leather. The second third moves into caramely notes with coffee background. The last third finishes with black pepper toast, and aged leather.
